title: It May Be Gone Fast! | Luxe & New 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath! Call Now!
map_address: 10423 Rainier Ridge Blvd E near Rainier Ridge Blvd & 187th St E
posting_body: Take your life to new heights at the edge of Mt Rainier.

Hugging the edge of Mt Rainier National Park, with stunning mountain backdrops, Ascend Rainier Ridge is a community of apartments, casitas and duplexes offering one, two and three- bedroom floor plans.
With awe-inspiring views from every window, enjoy life at a relaxed pace with intentional upgrades catered to your needs.
EV charging stations, two dog parks, a heated pool and cabana lounge, on-site coffee bar and a fully-equipped fitness center are just the start of the all-inclusive amenity spaces available to you.
Each home is complete with luxury fixtures and finishes, including stunning quartz countertops and tile surrounds, stainless steel appliances and spacious living spaces to make the most of every day.
Our casitas and duplex homes include ample fenced yard space – an oasis just for you!
This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1364 Sq.
- Large stainless steel kitchen sink with sleek pull-down Moen faucet
- One, two and three bedroom apartment homes
- Two and three bedroom casita residences
- Full size, energy-efficient washer and dryer included
- Double sink vanities and separate linen cabinets*
- Heated, resort-style pool and cabana lounge
- Community club house with fitness center, yoga and spin room
We welcome up to two pets per apartment home.
Please call for complete pet policy information.
Applicants must collectively have verifiable income in an amount not less than 3 times the rental rate.
Turn left off of Meridian Avenue onto 187th St, then turn right on Rainier Ridge Blvd.
10423 Rainier Ridge Blvd E, Puyallup, WA, 98374
We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.
